transcript:
Customer: Hello sir ji.
Executive: Sir wo aapko maine message kar rakha hai aap please usko dekhiye aur mujhe wo de dijiye main verify karwa deta hu aapka.
Customer: Sir wo GST wo to aapke paas diya hua hai already.
Executive: Wo purana abhi wala nahi de sakte hain kya updated abhi wo team hamari mang rahi hai na tab ja ke uske baad wo revert de payegi mujhe isliye main mang raha hu aapse.
Customer: Nahi nahi par usme Ahmedabad to usi me mention to hai nahi wo jo main aapko dunga to usme bhi.
Executive: Aap mujhe bhejiye wo aap jisme nahi mention hai wo bhi main aage bhejta hu agar wo agar ho payega to update karwa payenge jo bhi revert aayega main aapko bata dunga inform kar dunga ki sir ye dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Okay to main kal karwa deta hu chaliye na.
Executive: Wo GST to jo aapne abhi address dala hai na 350 wala.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ha wo document to salo se submit hai aaj ka nahi matlab char panch che bar diya hai usme sab ye.
Executive: Diya hoga lekin wo diya hoga but wo yaha pe kahi dikh nahi raha tha wo sirf uska jo noted rehta hai jaise ki address wagera ho gaya aur bhi GST number wagera wo bas updated hai na ki wo PDF form me jo ha aata hai.
Customer: Ha ha ha wo nahi hai wo nahi hai update wo mujhe aap de dijiye theek hai.
Executive: Ha wo wo karwa dunga par wo aap ek kabhi usse baat kar lijiyega ki wo hai to wohi Baroda wala hi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Baroda wala ha wohi main keh raha hu aap mujhe dijiye wo cheez main ek bar discuss karta hu ho payega to main bilkul karwa diya jayega.
Customer: Okay ha ha ha ha mujhe dijiye jab GST me ye aur ye sab tha na.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Purana wo time me hum log Ahmedabad se register hue the.
Customer: Aur hum logo ne business start kiya to wo Ahmedabad wale unit se hi kiya tha fir yaha interchanger wale me yada hai.
Customer: Isliye humne registration yaha ka bhi karwaya aur factory yaha hai humara jo main location aur main business start up hua tha wo Ahmedabad se hi hua tha bhi udhar hai.
Executive: Chaliye chaliye aap mujhe bhejiye main ek bar fir discuss karke hi bata paunga theek hai wo main samajh raha hu theek hai.
Customer: Bhijwa dunga main aapko kal wo aapka message to aa gaya hai.
Executive: Ha to bas usi bhej dijiye mujhe fir batayega theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to update GST details.

- Ahmedabad not mentioned in current GST document.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to send document.

- Executive will check for possible updates.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the document.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, update, document, ahmedabad
